    • android.content.Context

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.content.ComponentCallbacks, android.content.ComponentCallbacks2, android.support.v4.app.ActivityCompat.OnRequestPermissionsResultCallback, android.support.v4.app.ActivityCompatApi23.RequestPermissionsRequestCodeValidator, android.support.v4.app.TaskStackBuilder.SupportParentable, android.support.v7.app.ActionBarDrawerToggle.DelegateProvider, android.support.v7.app.AppCompatCallback, android.view.KeyEvent.Callback, android.view.LayoutInflater.Factory, android.view.LayoutInflater.Factory2, android.view.View.OnCreateContextMenuListener, android.view.Window.Callback, ActivityResultListener
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ConversationActivity, ConversationsActivity, QuestionnaireActivity, QuickStartActivity, SettingsActivity, SplashActivity

    public abstract class AbstractActivity
extends android.support.v7.app.AppCompatActivity
implements ActivityResultListener
    Base activity that provides methods for showing fragments. Notice that activity view should have FrameLayout with id=R.id.content which will be used as fragment container.
